description.author: ARATA Mizuki
description.synopsis: Directed rounding for built-in floating types
description.description: Please see the README on GitHub at <https://github.com/minoki/rounded-hw#readme>

package-flags.name: c99
package-flags.description: Restrict use of platform-dependent features (e.g. SSE2) and only use C99 features

package-flags.name: ghc-prim
package-flags.description: Use GHC's "foreign import prim" on the supported platform
